sub_title: Senior Geoscientist | Domain Expert | Integration Lead
summary:
Geologist specializing in carbonate diagenesis, sedimentology, and integrated subsurface modeling, I have worked on several integrated projects in a variety of basins mainly within the Middle East, the US, and the UK, with different levels of stratigraphic and structural complexity. I have experience in areas such as exploration, production, brownfield development, and potential alternative energies.

In 2012, I transitioned from academia to the hydrocarbon industry to broaden my skills in Production Geosciences. Currently, I combine my strong Geosciences expertise with software development and data analysis. I aim to continue to strengthen my current skill-set, expand my technical abilities further, and explore new aspects of applied geosciences.

Technical strengths:

Production geology domain expert

Carbonate geology & diagenesis

Lean & Scrum, Agile, software development (POPM)

profile_positions.description:
Integration Lead, Shell-Baker Hughes Joint Development | Member of Radiant Leadership Team

Delivering digital solutions and integrated workflows for subsurface evaluations and Wells, Reservoir and Facilities Management. Scoping global opportunities for JewelSuiteTM, a Baker Hughes commercial software, and Shell's end-to-end subsurface modeling platform, PetroSigns. Working across organizational boundaries, I drive integration and implementation of key stakeholder requirements and digital differentiators that help optimize subsurface decision making, global value delivery, in Shell. Whilst, enabling a commercial offering.
profile_positions.title: Senior Geoscientist | Domain expert | POPM software development & deployment

profile_positions.description:
Subsurface modeling software development and deployment: JewelSuite & PetroSigns. 

Pragmatic and business-value driven Domain Expert, Product Owner and focal point. 

Key technical input, concept ideation and prioritization of business requirements, testing and, supervision of delivery for multiple business-critical functionalities.

Enabling the successful delivery of the proprietary, PetroSigns Earth, Business Deployment Platform. 

Ensuring full Bronze-level geodetic integrity, 2D interpolation tooling, Technical Data Management, Petrel and corporate database connection. Including, planning and input into WRFM, structural frameworks and property modelling workflows.

Driving development of novel, proprietary, QAQC and reporting Add-on. 

Leading behavior driven development initiatives: fostering of user base, with integrated planning, validation and learning.
profile_positions.title: Production Geology Domain Expert | POPM

profile_positions.description:
Product Management support for the development of Subsurface modeling software: JewelSuite & Petrosigns Earth

Delivery of Roadmap: PetroSigns steer, strategy and accountability, Shell and Radiant Joint-Development. 

Leveraging business critical requirements, through behavior driven development, to enable several successful flag-ship deployments.   

Delivery of internal and external ambassador engagement materials, quarterly newsletter summaries and network communications.

Led PetroSigns WRFM strategy alignment. Cross-team, cross-platform alignment, including key WRFM business representatives. 

Strong HSSE and value delivery focus.
profile_positions.title: Interim Product Manager | Production Geology Domain Expert

profile_positions.description:
Subsurface modeling software - Software development and deployment - Training and software support: JewelSuite & PetroSigns

Project management and focal point for multiple successful software deployments, to flagship assets

Delivered Cross-team deployment terms of reference, workflow consultancy, specialist static modelling input and trouble-shooting.

Delivery of taylored software training and staff coaching (e.g. geoscience, geodetics & TDM). With a focus on multi-scenario modelling – IRM, Uncertainty Management and WRFM workflows.

Development and delivery of integrated static modelling and field training. Shell, Dolomites, 2019
profile_positions.title: Production Geology Consultant | Workflow Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Subsurface modeling software Workflow  Advisor - Software development and deployment

Subject matter expert and product management, Shell-Baker Hughes Joint development; Delivering business requirements

Leading a team of support staff for the handling of user issues and coordinating manual pre-release testing

Creation and delivery of training materials and taylored courses
Hypercare support and specialist geology input

Leading communications and behavior driven development

Design, application, and coordination of the user enhancement requests review process. Achieving review of over 1400 requests and a weekly turn-around in reporting and feedback. Leading to implementation of over 100 business critical functionalities
profile_positions.title: Workflow Advisor | Product Owner

profile_positions.description: Contributing to a joint development project between Shell and Baker Hughes. I work with a team of specialists to provide steer for several geological static modelling elements of the revamped Jewel Suite platform (e.g. stratigraphic model, structural model, well correlation and fluid model). Other responsibilities include collaborating with end-user business units to test the software through building fit-for-purpose, geological, subsurface models. The aim is to improve the quality of subsurface models across Shell, through effective development and deployment of suitable technology. Communication with research groups, the PG community and global discipline leadership to align technology with business objectives across Shell is a critical part of the role.
profile_positions.title: Carbonate Geologist - Subsurface modeling software development

profile_positions.description:
Research and innovation, specialising in:
 - Carbonate diagenesis & Static modelling

Assessment of integrated data-sets from several carbonate fields mainly within the Middle East and US, with a range of carbonate depositional environments. 

Delivered petrography, rock typing schemes and input to integrated technical reports, North Field, Qatar.
Delivered user interface design, idea generation, testing and deployment of Shell-proprietary Petrel Plug-ins and novel multi-attribute analysis techniques. 3D static model for the Trenton Black River, US and published technical report.

Orchestrated training & field courses:
- Carbonate & structural diagenesis, Great Orme, North Wales, 2013 (Field course | Shell & IAS)
- Carbonate diagenesis and applications in the hydrocarbon industry, Parma University, 2014 (Training | Shell)
